blogPost.title: This is the craziest action in markets you may ever see.
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 这是市场中最疯狂的行动，你可能会看到。
這是市場中最瘋狂的行動，你可能會看到。

previous.excerpt:
I have been DCA for a few years now, but recently I have been worried more and
more about a potential market crash. I know that those cannot be predicted, but
I cannot help but deep inside feel like the market is being weird right now.
With what happened to Tesla, and more and more people finding…
previous.title: FOMO, and fear of crash. I know my feelings are not rational, yet they are bothering me.

localize.title: FOMO，又怕撞车。我知道自己的感受并不理智，但却在困扰着我。

我做DCA已经好几年了，但最近我越来越担心了。
